name: Find in page
description:
Find layers and texts in your design, navigate between the results and replace all in one click.


How to use:

  1. Select search scope (Selection / Page / File)
  2. Type a phrase
  3. Select if to 'match word'
  4. Select search elements (Layers / Texts)
  5. If 'Layers' selected - Choose layer type
  6. Run the plugin
  7. Click on the result name to zoom on layer
  8. Select all / specific result
  9. Replace the phrase you typed in the layers names / texts with new phrase


Important notes:

  • Don't search for phrases that will return lots of results. It will take a long time to get them or the plugin will crash.
  • You can't select all / replace multiple layers when the results contain layers from different pages
